title: Start
body:
Hello, traveler! What brings you here?

[[I'm looking for adventure.|adventure_choice]]
[[Just passing through.|passing_choice]]

title: adventure_choice
body:
Ah, an adventurer! Do you seek treasure or glory?

[[Treasure!|treasure]]
[[Glory!|glory]]

title: passing_choice
body:
I see. Well, safe travels, friend.

[[Thanks!|end]]

title: treasure
body:
There are rumors of a hidden treasure deep in the forest. Beware the dangers!

[[I'll be careful.|end]]

title: glory
body:
Ah, the pursuit of glory. There are battles to be fought and legends to be made!

[[I'm ready for battle.|end]]

title: end
body: Good luck on your journey. May fortune favor you!
